mapper.insert: INSERT INTO group_board (group_id, user_id, type, title, content, created_at) VALUES (#{groupId}, #{userId}, #{type}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT gb.board_id, gb.group_id, gb.user_id, gb.type, gb.title, gb.content, gb.created_at, m.nickname AS writerNickname FROM group_board gb JOIN member m ON gb.user_id = m.user_id WHERE gb.group_id = #{groupId} ORDER BY CASE WHEN gb.type = 'NOTICE' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END ASC, gb.created_at DESC

SELECT gb.board_id, gb.group_id, gb.user_id, gb.type, gb.title, gb.content, gb.created_at, m.nickname AS writerNickname FROM group_board gb JOIN member m ON gb.user_id = m.user_id WHERE gb.board_id = #{boardId}
